"Independence Day is an opportunity to reassert our love for #Lebanon and our readiness to sacrifice to protect its sovereignty"
"We should avoid internal rifts and the dangers of regional struggles, and work to develop a national defense strategy"
"We should help all refugees but can not allow Lebanon to be a base of attacks for others in the region"
"We are determined to hold the elections on time. This decision should be the basis for agreeing on a new electoral law"
"The essence of independence is not to use foreign powers against eachother. Let us all head to dialogue with an open heart"
"Politicians should stop meddling with the judiciary." I call on all security and judicial powers to apply the laws firmly and courageously "

Reported cases of crime has reduced under my watch following the application of technology, additional logistics n more police recruitment
Fairness is when same justice is applied to all.
Judgment debts are awarded by courts of competent jurisdiction n can therefore not be corruption. We need to look at the causes.
We must look at the frivolous cancellation of valid subsisting contracts by the last government which  resulted in judgment debts.

I intend to set up a fund for women seeking elective public office in order to empower more women rise to these positions.
